attributes.action: Roll out a vaccination passport across the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Because it will be the fastest way back to normal life across the UK
attributes.background:
Roll out a nationwide vaccine passport, so businesses, school and people lives can get back to normal as soon as possible. 

This will ensure the UK economy bounces back sa soon as possible to save hundreds of thousands of jobs and also create jobs for people who have lost them during COVID.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575297
